containerInfo.title: Hi! I'm Federico
containerInfo.description: Hello and welcome to my portfolio. I'm a web developer focused on creating innovative solutions for real problems. Here you can find examples of my work and skills, and see how I can contribute to your project.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.paragraph1: I am a full-stack developer based in Argentina, with a Bachelor's degree in Tudai from Unicen University.
aboutMe.paragraph2: I have 3 years of experience working on complex projects, including SaaS platforms, search engines with Google Lens, advanced programming search engines, system integrations, databases, Google Sites, Google extensions, and performance optimization platforms.
aboutMe.paragraph3: I am passionate about building useful applications, continuously learning, and improving the projects I am involved in. I am proactive, work well in teams, and enjoy solving challenging problems.

items.title: Platform Matcheador
items.description: It's a complete SaaS platform designed to manage and optimize workflows in Mercado Libre's operations. It supports multiple roles, each with its own dashboards, permissions, and specific actions.

items.title: ProfileHub
items.description: It is a CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application developed in React, using Tremor components and styles with Tailwind CSS.

items.title: Extension Matcheador
items.description: It's an advanced Google Chrome extension developed to optimize product matching tasks on Mercado Libre. It dynamically reads tasks from a database and adapts its interface based on the task type, opening comparison windows between Mercado Libre and its competitors.

items.title: Movieflix
items.description: Netflix-style platform where users can explore and manage movies, series, and games. It features secure authentication, user profiles, and personal lists all supported by a solid MVC backend connected to MongoDB.

items.title: Guide Matcheador
items.description: Is an informational Google Site that centralizes all the technical and operational documentation for the Matcheador project. It includes instructional videos, validation criteria, competitor and country lists, spreadsheets, and repository links

items.title: Netkel Search
items.description: It is an advanced search platform to obtain optimized results using the Google search engine, offering accurate and fast matches between products from different e-commerce sites.

items.title: Test Technical
items.description: Technical assessment platform for frontend (React) and backend (Python) development candidates. Features automated tests that provide instant feedback, integrated with a backend that automatically sends the results via email.
